title: Appointment Setter (Work From Home)
job_overview:
Lead Generation & Prospecting: 

Research and identify potential clients through various channels (online platforms, networking, etc.).

Initiate contact with prospects via cold calls, emails, and social media outreach. Client Engagement: Present and promote products or services to prospective clients.

Conduct initial conversations to understand customer needs and pain points. 

Qualify leads based on established criteria. 

Pipeline Management: Maintain an organized pipeline of leads and opportunities. 

Schedule meetings or demos for senior sales representatives or account managers. 

Collaboration & Reporting: Work closely with the sales team to align strategies and handoff qualified leads. 

Provide regular updates and reports on lead status, market trends, and customer feedback. 

Market Research & Insights: Stay informed about industry trends, competitor offerings, and market dynamics. 

Identify potential new markets or industries for expansion. 

Targets & Performance: Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly KPIs, including lead generation and conversion targets. 

Continuously improve outreach methods based on feedback and results. 

Salary: 20,000.00 Monthly

Qualifications: 

-College Graduate 
-with atleast 1 yr experience in BP0/Call Center/Customer Service/Appointment Setter 

To move forward, please connect with us on Microsoft Teams using the link details:
